alert.note: Alert for Spink (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 11 at 10:09AM MDT until August 13 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Aberdeen SD has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in South Dakota... James River At Ashton affecting Spink County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO EARLY SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...James River At Ashton. * WHEN...From this morning to early Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 13.0 feet, Flooding begins to affect some crop land along with moderate flooding of pasture and low-lying areas * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:45 AM CDT Friday the stage was 13.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 10:45 AM CDT Friday was 13.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 13.1 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow evening. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/abr. The next statement will be issued by 100 AM CDT Sunday morning.
